articles.title: Measles cases in South Africa rise to 227 - Daijiworld.com
articles.description:
Johannesburg, Dec 24 (IANS): The National Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD) of South Africa has said that measles cases in the country had risen to 227 as of December 17.
